title: Signal fault causing delays on Circle Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 信号故障导致环线延误
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan isyarat menyebabkan kelewatan di Laluan Bulat
title_translations.ta: சிக்னல் கோளாறு காரணமாக வட்ட பாதையில் தாமதங்கள்

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Train services between Harbour Front and Kent Ridge are now running normally.
[CCL] Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time between Harbour Front and  Kent Ridge due to signal fault.
